title: Black Sabbath
description:
www.ticketmaster.co.nz/Black-Sabbath-tickets/artist/734569?tm_link=…
BLACK SABBATH New Zealand Tour 2013

Original Band Members Reunite for First New Zealand Show in Nearly 40 Years

FIRST SHOW SOLD OUT SECOND SHOW CONFIRMED FOR MONDAY 22 APRIL, 2013

BLACK SABBATH – the band credited with creating heavy metal and one of the most influential bands of all time will perform in New Zealand next April - their first New Zealand show in nearly 40 years.

Tickets to the Saturday 20 April show sold out within moments this morning, now a second show has been confirmed for MONDAY, 22 APRIL at Auckland’s Vector Arena, tickets are on sale now through Ticketmaster – www.ticketmaster.co.nz

Original band members – the Prince of Darkness himself: Ozzy Osbourne, bassist Geezer Butler and guitarist Tony Iommi will make a thunderous return to New Zealand in April 2013 for an arena show at Auckland’s Vector Arena on Saturday April 20 - their first New Zealand concert since performing at the Great Ngaruawahia Music Festival in January 1973.

Prepare to be blown away by these living Rock Legends: BLACK SABBATH. Never Say Die!

AUCKLAND VECTOR ARENA SATURDAY APRIL 20 – SOLD OUT
AUCKLAND VECTOR ARENA MONDAY APRIL 22 – NEW SHOW



Read more: http://www.undertheradar.co.nz/news/6074/Second-Black-Sabbath-Show-Announced.utr#ixzz2DeutjE2B
